title: I'M IN TWO DIFFERENT GAMES? Won't let me reconnect!
body:
Okay SO, I was 9 minutes into my ranked game. My ping is fine, internet all fine and dandy. All of a sudden, I DC. So I assumed my internet just spazzed out at that moment. So I went to restart the client to get back into the game. But on the client there is NO reconnect button. It looked normal, I mean, as if I were never in a game. I check OP.GG and it says I'm still in the match. I don't know how to get back into my current game... so I just.. now I'm in champ select for a new game.

THIS ISN'T EVEN A LIE. I DON'T KNOW HOW THIS EVEN HAPPENED. I JUST CAN'T GET BACK INTO MY FIRST GAME SO now I'm in a new one. Did I do something wrong??!?!?!

replies.body: Same thing just happened to me in a ranked game, was 30+ minutes into a match and client stated attempting to reconnect, didn't connect for 2 minutes so i exited the game in hopes it would give me reconnect option and nothing showed.

It sounds like your first match might have ended as a [remake](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ), so it returned you to the lobby.  It's hard to tell, though, without more info about the match itself.  If you're specifically getting your info from a third party site, just be cautious.  The information on there might be inaccurate or out of sync, and not something we support.  Hope that helps clear things up.
